com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

Class ListNodeTranslator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.AbstractTranslator<T>
      • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.ListNodeTranslator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollectionTranslatorFactory.CollectionListNodeTranslator, MapifyTranslatorFactory.MapifyListNodeTranslator

    public abstract class ListNodeTranslator<T>
extends AbstractTranslator<T>

    Helper which expects a list node in the data structure and throws an exception one is not found. Also handles skipping when a null list is found.

    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer
